text: Donald Joseph Albosta (December 5, 1925 - December 18, 2014) was an American politician. A Democrat, he was Saginaw County Commissioner from 1970 to 1974 and served in the Michigan State House of Representatives from 1974 to 1976, representing the 86th District. Albosta died on December 18, 2014 in St. Charles, Michigan, aged 89.Donald Albosta-obituary ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Saginaw, Michigan
title: Donald J. Albosta
